Encrypted Hex: 0F 00 12 00

Convert to Binary:
0F = 00001111  
00 = 00000000  
12 = 00010010  
00 = 00000000  

Key Binary:
C = 67   = 01000011  
O = 79   = 01001111  
D = 68   = 01000100  
E = 69   = 01000101  

XOR to Decrypt:
00001111 ⊕ 01000011 = 01001100 = L  
00000000 ⊕ 01001111 = 01001111 = O  
00010010 ⊕ 01000100 = 01010110 = V  
00000000 ⊕ 01000101 = 01000101 = E

Decrypted Message: LOVE
